MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL58 postcode area of Beaumaris, affecting a number of properties in the local area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a faulty transformer and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:19PM on 23rd February 2021.
